column4: Hi I just changed from Ubuntu 8.10 to Jaunty and after that my Wifi Card with Atheros chipset is nowhere to be seen in iwconfig hardware->divers shows it activatet madwifi driver... still doesnt work... lspci finds this : Atheros Communications Inc. Atheros AR5001X+ Wireless Network Adapter
I have same chipset activaating the madwifi worked here
